verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, When I bring the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon a land <S%H776><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from among <S%H7097><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, and set him for their watchman <S%H6822><s%>;
if <S%H7200><s%>, when he seeth the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, he blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and warn <S%H2094><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>;

then whosoever <S%H8085><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and taketh not warning <S%H2094><s%>, if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, and take him away <S%H3947><s%>, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>.

He heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and took not warning <S%H2094><s%>; his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon him <S%H2094><s%>; whereas if he had taken warning, he would have delivered <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.

But if the watchman <S%H6822><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, and blow <S%H8628><s%> not the trumpet <S%H7782><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> be not warned <S%H2094><s%>, and the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> from among them <S%H3947><s%>; he is taken away in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> at the watchman <S%H6822><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, I have set <S%H5414><s%> thee a watchman <S%H6822><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and give them warning from me <S%H2094><s%>.

When I say <S%H559><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H4191><s%>, thou shalt surely die <S%H4191><s%>, and thou dost not speak <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%>; that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H2094><s%>, if thou warn the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from it <S%H7725><s%>, and he turn not from his way <S%H1870><s%>; he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, but thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Thus ye speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H2403><s%> are upon us <S%H4743><s%>, and we pine away in them <S%H2421><s%>; how then can we live?

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2416><s%>, As I live, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; but that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live <S%H2421><s%>: turn <S%H7725><s%> ye <S%H7725><s%>, turn ye from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>; for why will ye die <S%H4191><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not deliver <S%H5337><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his transgression <S%H6588><s%>; and as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, he shall not fall <S%H3782><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he turneth <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; neither shall he that is righteous <S%H6662><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he sinneth <S%H2398><s%>.

When I say <S%H559><s%> to the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, that he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>; if he trust <S%H982><s%> to his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, none of his righteous <S%H6666><s%> deeds shall be remembered <S%H2142><s%>; but in his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he hath committed <S%H6213><s%>, therein shall he die <S%H4191><s%>.

Again <S%H559><s%>, when I say unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>; if he turn <S%H7725><s%> from his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>;

if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> the pledge <S%H2258><s%>, give again <S%H7999><s%> that which he had taken by robbery <S%H1500><s%>, walk <S%H1980><s%> in the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%>, committing <S%H6213><s%> no iniquity <S%H5766><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.

None of his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he hath committed <S%H2398><s%> shall be remembered <S%H2142><s%> against him <S%H6213><s%>: he hath done that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>; he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>.

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>: but as for them <S%H1870><s%>, their way is not equal <S%H8505><s%>.
When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turneth <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and committeth <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, he shall even die therein <S%H4191><s%>.

And when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turneth <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%>, and doeth <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right <S%H6666><s%>, he shall live thereby <S%H2421><s%>.

Yet ye say <S%H559><s%>, The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal <S%H8505><s%>. O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you every one <S%H376><s%> after his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And it came to pass in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity <S%H1546><s%>, in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2568><s%>, in the fifth day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that one that had escaped <S%H6412><s%> out of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, The city <S%H5892><s%> is smitten <S%H5221><s%>.

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had been upon me in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> he that was escaped <S%H6412><s%> came <S%H935><s%>; and he had opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, until he came <S%H935><s%> to me in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened <S%H6605><s%>, and I was no more dumb <S%H481><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, they that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> those waste <S%H2723><s%> places in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%> was one <S%H259><s%>, and he inherited <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: but we are many <S%H7227><s%>; the land <S%H776><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> us for inheritance <S%H4181><s%>.

Wherefore say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Ye eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto your idols <S%H1544><s%>, and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: and shall ye possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>?

Ye stand <S%H5975><s%> upon your sword <S%H2719><s%>, ye work <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%>, and ye defile <S%H2930><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>: and shall ye possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>?

Thus shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: As I live <S%H2416><s%>, surely they that are in the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and him that is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> to be devoured <S%H398><s%>; and they that are in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and an astonishment <S%H8077><s%>; and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> shall cease <S%H7673><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be desolate <S%H8074><s%>, so that none shall pass through <S%H5674><s%>.

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I have made <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and an astonishment <S%H8077><s%>, because of all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they have committed <S%H6213><s%>.

And as for thee <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> of <S%H681><s%> thee by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the houses <S%H1004><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> one <S%H2297><s%> to another <S%H259><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Come <S%H935><s%>, I pray you <S%H8085><s%>, and hear what is the word <S%H1697><s%> that cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And they come <S%H935><s%> unto thee as the people <S%H5971><s%> cometh <S%H3996><s%>, and they sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee as my people <S%H5971><s%>, and they hear <S%H8085><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>, but do <S%H6213><s%> them not <S%H6310><s%>; for with their mouth they show <S%H6213><s%> much love <S%H5690><s%>, but their heart <S%H3820><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gain <S%H1215><s%>.

And <S%H5690><s%>, lo, thou art unto them as a very lovely song <S%H7892><s%> of one that hath a pleasant <S%H3303><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, and can play well <S%H2895><s%> on an instrument <S%H5059><s%>; for they hear <S%H8085><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%>, but they do them not <S%H6213><s%>.
And when this cometh to pass <S%H935><s%>, (behold <S%H935><s%>, it cometh,) then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> hath been among them <S%H8432><s%>.
